features: SAY GOODBYE TO RAZOR-BURNS: This classic shave cream with special pH formula makes a smooth foam that protects your skin and helps eliminate razor burns, reduce dry skin, rashes, nicks, and cuts. Its creamy lather softens tough whiskers and soothes the skin at the same time. Suitable for all skin and beard types. Specifically formulated to suit your shaving needs!

MOISTURIZING SHAVE CREAM: Clubman Shave Cream’s rich and creamy lather secures moisture into the skin for a smoother, almost friction-free shave. It lubricates the skin and beard for a closer shave and allows razors to glide effortlessly over the skin, leaving the face nourished and moisturized even after shaving

ENRICHED WITH ALOE VERA AND NATURAL INGREDIENTS: Clubman Shave Cream is formulated with a masterful blend of Coco butter, Shea butter, Chamomile, and Aloe Vera extract which moisturizes, hydrates, soothes, and conditions skin for a perfect closer, cleaner and smoother shave to deliver the most comfortable grooming experience.

EASY TO USE: Have a barbershop experience at home with Clubman Shave Cream. Rinse your face with warm water and massage the shaving cream into the skin for 30 seconds before shaving and notice the difference! After shaving, rub the rest of the cream on your face to get moisturized and pat dry. You are set to go in a jiffy! Also, you can enjoy its invigorating masculine yet gentle scent throughout the day!

TRUSTED AND SAFE: Clubman is committed to excellence in men’s grooming to help them smell, look and feel at their best. Crafted with safe, natural ingredients to give you the smoothest shave possible anytime, anywhere. Paraben and cruelty - free. Never tested on animals - proudly made in the US. It's not surprising that this has been the gentleman’s choice for clean, smooth shaving over the years.
body.description: Aloe Vera For A Smoother and Moisturized FinishBecause of Aloe Vera’s moisturizing and soothing properties, this Clubman Shave Cream is the excellent product to trust your shaving routine with. It provides good lubrication that allows for a smoother, cleaner, and comfortable shave, cutting your hair closer without nicking and damaging the skin. The Aloe Vera properties also help relieve your post-shave skin, lessening the risk of irritation and parched skin.Rich Lather To Soften Your WhiskersClubman Shave Cream’s lather reduces the tension and gives a wet, smooth, and fine canvas so you can glide the razor seamlessly. It’s creamy white lather also serves as the best medium to track what’s been done and what needs trimming so you won’t have to do some guesswork and end up with a patchy result.Your Go-To Classic Shave CreamIf you’re going to use a product on the daily, why not a trusted brand that knows what you need? A long-standing barber’s staple, Clubman only provides the best products to answer your shaving needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This shaving cream is hard to find in stores, so when I saw it on Amazon, I had to buy not one but two cans. The shaving cream is just as good if not better than the less expensive shaving creams out there. This shaving cream smells so good and helps me have such a clean close shave that when I look in the mirror, I'm actually better looking (ha, ha) now, then before I shaved with Clubman Pinaud. I also recommend you buy this and their talcom (after shower) power. I bought the three pack of it. Spoil yourself. You deserve it and Club Pinaud cand help you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works very well
reviews.reviewText: Had heard about shaving oil and was skeptical. After trying it multiple times I’m impressed with the shave quality. Smoother glide and cleaner shave. Just make sure you clean out the oil between shaves

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: couple this with the beard preshave oil and you get a very comfortable, clean shave

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Does a good job on razor cuts. Smells great and goes on super easy, great oil.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good basic shave soap
reviews.reviewText: Lathers well and shaves well; scent is decent. I prefer Arko for scent, longevity and (subject to change) price, but it wouldn't be fair to deduct a star for that. Taken on its own, it's pretty good. If this was all I had, I wouldn't complain. Wish they sold it in a more cost-effective option than the little tiny 2oz plastic dishes. I know it's a lot softer than your average stick or puck, but so what if it gets smashed a little in the mail? You're just going to smoosh it into your bowl anyway.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Lotsa suds and great smell. Lasts a long time.

reviews.reviewText: Husband really likes it. Will order again.
